column2: An HTTP request handler that performs expensive operations without restricting the rate at which operations can be carried out is vulnerable to denial-of-service attacks.
column4: This route handler performs [["a database access"|"relative:///index.js:32:34:35:5"]], but is not rate-limited.

column2: Hard-coding credentials in source code may enable an attacker to gain unauthorized access.
column4: The hard-coded value "your_database_user" is used as [["user name"|"relative:///index.js:14:9:14:28"]].
